name: BOT vs BASE early access
description:
Early Access Game - Keep in mind that this game is in early access, but once purchased, you'll have access all future expansions, update, new levels and Steam key if this game get into steam. Who purchase this early access game will also have the chance to shape the game.

Bot vs Base Early Access V 1.0. About this game - It's 2056. Mankind has gone through severe warfare, extremists have managed to built sophisticated hypersonic anti missile system, that can destroy nearly any incoming missile/ fighter Jet. Resources are limited, You play as a Robot in first person mode and your target is to destroy the enemy base including Sci -fi turrets, Drones, multi launcher rocket system and anti-missile defense system.

Keep in mind that this game is made using unreal engine 4 so a decent graphics card is required to play smoothly. As far as system requirement is concerned, if you've a decent graphics card with decent spec this game should works fine, if not, you maybe able to play with lowest settings, and you may mention your specs and what FPS you were getting during playing this early access version. Minimum supported windows version is windows vista.

Control & how to play

Download & extract the zip folder. Find the EULA in game folder read it. Find the exe file click to play, nothing will be installed.

W, A, S, D - Movement controls

Mouse for look around

Space bar - Jump

E - Boost to jump higher, if available

R - Fire Missile

Mouse left click - Left fire

Mouse Right click - Right fire

Middle mouse button to zoom in

Escape - Menu

Green circle fill indicated health

Red bars indicate heating, if it's full, continuous firing is not possible.
